name: Midnight Mass (WumpusGimlet)
description:
Midnight Mass is a short text adventure maker to let your creative mind flow!

Equipped with tools to let you make branching paths, optional dialogue, and create timed events all within the realm of a few clicks, we encourage you to get creative and make the stories YOU want to tell!

Coupled with a starter story example as the main game to give you some spooky storytelling, we hope you enjoy our little project and have a blast making your own adventures!
